name: DUMBLEDORE64
description:
Take a nostalgic journey through the great wizard DUMBLEDORE's very first adventure on the big screen, as he obtains his trusty DUMBLEBEAM staff and learns a thing or two about magic and the power of friendship.
DUMBLEDORE64 is an epic arcade action dual stick shooter with an absolutely mystical element combination system and an intricate, non-linear world.






DUMBLEDORE64 is also available on mobile, as "DUMBLE"!
Take your 'Dore out the door!
